languages.text: "Палаты в глубине шпиля, недалеко от врат Паутины... быть может, там я отыщу то, что так алчет моя душа. Поторопимся".
"The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."
languages.original_text: "Палаты в глубине шпиля, недалеко от врат Паутины... быть может, там я отыщу то, что так алчет моя душа. Поторопимся".

traits.locale_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."

traits.locale_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."

traits.locale_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Les salles au cœur de la tour, non loin du portail sur la Toile... J'y trouverai peut-être ce que mon âme désire si désespérément. Dépêchons-nous. »
languages.original_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."

traits.locale_text: « Les salles au cœur de la tour, non loin du portail sur la Toile... J'y trouverai peut-être ce que mon âme désire si désespérément. Dépêchons-nous. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Las cámaras que buscamos están en el corazón de la torre, cerca del Portal de la Telaraña... tal vez allí encuentre lo que mi alma ansía tanto. Démonos prisa».
languages.original_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."

traits.locale_text: «Las cámaras que buscamos están en el corazón de la torre, cerca del Portal de la Telaraña... tal vez allí encuentre lo que mi alma ansía tanto. Démonos prisa».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「網辻門の近くの、尖塔の中心にある部屋…おそらくそこで、俺の魂が切望しているものが見つかるはずだ。さあ、急ごう」
languages.original_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."

traits.locale_text: 「網辻門の近くの、尖塔の中心にある部屋…おそらくそこで、俺の魂が切望しているものが見つかるはずだ。さあ、急ごう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “在尖塔中心的密室，离网道不太远……或许到了那里，我就能找到我的灵魂渴求的东西了，赶紧走吧。”
languages.original_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."

traits.locale_text: “在尖塔中心的密室，离网道不太远……或许到了那里，我就能找到我的灵魂渴求的东西了，赶紧走吧。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Die Kammern im Herzen des Turms, unweit des Netzportals ... vielleicht finde ich dort, wonach meine Seele sich derart verzehrt. Sputen wir uns."
languages.original_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kammern im Herzen des Turms, unweit des Netzportals ... vielleicht finde ich dort, wonach meine Seele sich derart verzehrt. Sputen wir uns."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Kulenin merkezindeki odalar, Ağyol Geçidi'nden çok uzakta değil. Belki ruhumun delicesine arzuladığı şeyi orada bulabilirim. Acele edelim."
languages.original_text: "The chambers in the heart of the spire, not far from the Webway Gate... perhaps there I will find what my soul so desperately craves. Let us hurry."

traits.locale_text: "Kulenin merkezindeki odalar, Ağyol Geçidi'nden çok uzakta değiller. Belki ruhumun delicesine arzuladığı şeyi orada bulabilirim. Acele edelim."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
